content: I think I'll use a combination of captions and graphics to make my video more visually appealing. I'll make sure to keep them concise, consistent, and aligned with my brand's tone and personality. For the captions, I'll use a font that's easy to read and a color scheme that matches my brand. I might also add some animated GIFs to add a touch of humor to the bloopers and outtakes. Can you suggest some tools or resources to help me optimize my video for YouTube?
